description:
Zyscovich Architects is a nationally renowned integrated Urban Design, Architecture, and Interior Design firm headquartered in Miami, with additional locations in New York City, Orlando, Bogota and Tobago. Zyscovich's 45-year portfolio includes aviation, education, mixed-use, multi-family, hospitality, retail, and commercial facilities.

  • Leads the development of a project from inception through construction documents ensuring the quality and intent of the design.
  • Works independently on architectural design projects and coordinates project design efforts.
  • Identifies, through consultation, clients' requirements, approximate budget, timetable, and possible needs for future expansion.
  • Determines clients' preferences regarding materials, styles, colors, and other variables.
  • Attempts to identify through collaboration clients' priorities in terms of needs vs. desires.
  • Assists clients in defining their priorities and vision by preparing preliminary sketches of options.
  • Prepares and presents designs, specifications, estimated costs, and proposed construction schedule.
  • Modifies new or existing plans as required.
  • Performs other related duties as assigned.

Qualifications

  • Strong knowledge of design and construction methods.
  • Understanding of building tectonics and applicable codes.
  • Strong design and graphic skills.
  • Proficient in AutoCAD, Revit, Sketchup, and Adobe Creative Suite such as Photoshop, Illustrator, and InDesign desired.
  • Excellent communication and writing skills, attention to detail and highly organized. Self-starter, able to work independently and able to multi-task.
  • Knowledge with Academic projects a plus.
  • B.A. in Architecture
  • 10+ years experience
benefits: 401(k), Dental insurance, Vision insurance, Medical insurance, Pension plan, Paid maternity leave, Paid paternity leave, Commuter benefits, Disability insurance
